item.title: ICSEDS Successfully launch high altitude balloon
item.author: Ignaty Romanov-Chernigovsky,
item.description: The members of the IC Students for the Exploration and Development of Space Society (ICSEDS) headed out on 21st April to Elsworth, near Cambridge, to launch a balloon from an open field up to 30km into the atmosphere. On board we had our Arduino powered tracker transmitting its GPS coordinates to us â€¦
